summary:
Tesla Update 2024.20 Lets Matrix Headlights Adapt to Curves, Adds Supercharger Leaderboards and More - Tesla has released update 2024.20 with new features like Matrix Headlights adaptation and Supercharger Leaderboards.

 Tesla Auto Wipers: Why They Don't Work and Why There Isn't an Easy Fix - An article discussing the issues with Tesla's Autowipers and the challenges faced by customers and engineers.

 Tesla's Supercharger Team Shakeup: Firings, Rehiring, and Future Prospects - Tesla made changes to its Supercharger team, including firings and rehiring, impacting the future of the team.
